Class SaveGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • CSV
      • SaveGame

  • public class SaveGame
extends CSV
    this class extends CSV.java. This is suppose to handle saving data to a CSV file called 'saveGame' most of the methods are static because there only exist one CSV file for the save game.
    Author:
    josuerojas
